Products.ProductFeatures:
Made with lightweight fabric as our, these Coastal Board shorts are great for mild to warm weather and will keep you cool this summer! Our 4-way stretch woven material moves with your body, resulting in comfortable wear during a variety of outdoor activities. These resort board shorts feature a side pocket with zipper closure: no more lost items! Certified UPF 50+.

 

  • Certified UPF 50+
  • Chlorine and Salt Water Resistant
  • Lightweight, Quick Drying Stretch Woven Fabric
  • Our Stretch Woven Fabric Transitions from Swim to Everyday Seamlessly
  • Velcro Fly with Drawstring Closure
  • Single Side Pocket with Zipper Closure
  • Size 36 Inseam: 11"
  • Easy Care: Machine Wash, Line Dry
  • Imported
